pr_title: Dev-mode: don't warn if multi-module project

timeline.bodyText: Could you please change the second part to project.getParentFile() != null && project.getParentFile().exists()? It's an lot more simpler and efficient expression.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: I prefer the more DRY Optional approach but sure, I can (and will) change it.
replies.author: famod

replies.bodyText: I went with a slightly different approach with just one negation instead of two.
replies.author: famod
